member.name: T:Xtensive.Core.Weaver.Resources.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Xtensive.Core.Weaver.Resources.Strings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Xtensive.Core.Weaver.Resources.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Xtensive.Core.Weaver.Resources.Strings.ExCantWeavePublicMember
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Can't apply {{{0}}} weaver to a public member {{{1}}}..

member.name: P:Xtensive.Core.Weaver.Resources.Strings.ExCouldNotFindBaseConstructorForX
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not find base constructor for type '{0}'..

member.name: P:Xtensive.Core.Weaver.Resources.Strings.ExUnexpectedJoinPointKindX
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unexpected join point kind: {0}.

member.name: P:Xtensive.Core.Weaver.Resources.Strings.WeaverDebug
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {{{0}}}.

member.name: T:Xtensive.Core.Weaver.WeaverFactory
member.summary: Creates the weavers defined by the 'Xtensive.Core.Weaver' plug-in.
